examples: She always tries her best in everything she does.
This is the best ice cream I have ever had.
Ela sempre tenta fazer o melhor em tudo o que faz.
Este é o melhor sorvete que já comi.

suggested: This is one of the top-rated products on the market.
She is one of the top performers in her field.
The greatest basketball player of all time is Michael Jordan.
This is the greatest show I've ever seen.
She did an excellent job on the project.
The food at that restaurant is always excellent.
The quality of the artwork is superb.
This is a superb example of modern architecture.
He received an outstanding performance review from his boss.
The company has an outstanding reputation in the industry.
She is considered one of the preeminent experts in her field.
This is a preeminent example of Renaissance art.
The Supreme Court is the highest court in the United States.
This is a supreme example of craftsmanship.
